void SearchReplyData::setNbrHits (  int  startIdx,
int  endIdx,
int  total
) 
 

Sets the start and end index of the hits and also the total number of hits that can be returned.

Parameters:
startIdx Index of first hit sent back. (0 in vector)
endIdx Index of last hit sent back.
total The total number of hits including the sent ones.
